TheCompany

Edda is backed by respected venture capital firms.

Our team is made of passionate and motivated people from all around the world: United States, China, France, United Kingdom, India, Serbia, Ukraine, Ivory Coast, Lithuania,Portugal

Every team member brings a different point of view, which fuels creativity and innovation. Our diversity cultivates a core element of Eddas DNA:

Curiosity

We love to learn new things and we love to share knowledge. From space exploration to psychology, everyone is passionate about something.

At Edda, we encourage our team to never stop learning.

It's
an
idea
today

an empire tomorrow
